basics.name: Imed Kouki
basics.label: Master’s student in Computer Science and RPA Developer
basics.summary: Master’s student in Computer Science with keen interest in machine learning and automation. Currently working as a RPA Developer, looking to work on projects involving ML or automation, with a focus on both practical applications and research.

work.name: TUI Group
work.summary: Automated processes for 15,000 bookings, saving 5.7 FTEs and reducing costs. Cut handling time from 40 to an average of 6 minutes per booking.
highlights: Reduced error rates and achieved a handling time reduction from 40 minutes per case to an average of 6 minutes per booking.
Collaborated closely with responsible analysts and business collaborators to ensure seamless integration and functionality.

work.name: ADACTIM — WEEVIO Group
work.summary: Collaborated with analysts to create PDD with BPMN flowcharts, set up GLPI container with Docker, and developed UiPath automation for supervision process.
highlights: Configured and deployed a GLPI container using Docker/Docker Compose on Windows (WSL2).
Developed and tested UiPath-based automation solutions to streamline supervision processes.

work.name: DRÄXLMAIER — Group SATS
work.summary: Acquired practical experience in switch configuration and gained proficiency in utilizing Packet Tracer for network simulations.

education.institution: National School of Computer Science (ENSI) - University of Manouba
education.area: Master of Research in Computer Science
courses: Machine & Deep Learning, Basics of Verification, Probability & Statistics, Expert Systems, 3D-4D Computer Vision, Multidimensional Signal Processing

education.institution: Higher Institute Of Technological Studies (Rades/Siliana Branch)
courses: Object-oriented Programming, Software Architecture, Networking, Operating Systems; Big Data, Service-oriented Architecture

certificates.name: Certificate of AI Training and Project Completion

projects.name: Image Classification with CNN using PyTorch
projects.description: Developed a convolutional neural network (CNN) model for image classification using PyTorch, focusing on optimizing accuracy through hyperparameter tuning and data augmentation.

projects.name: SVD-Based ICP Algorithm
projects.description: Implementation of the Iterative Closest Point (ICP) algorithm, used for 3D point cloud registration. The ICP algorithm is widely used in computer vision, robotics, and 3D modeling to align two point clouds by iteratively minimizing the distance between corresponding points.
